summary:
Ishtar Hsu’s works are often presented in shattered images, photographic collages, abstract textures, and zoom-in displays. In the process of creation, she has always indulged herself in questioning the common sense of beauty, keeping trying to break the rules that limit us and the entire society. During the time of studying Master of Information Design at Design Academy Eindhoven (DAE) in the Netherlands, where she found the impact of art in the visual aspect. This inspired and encouraged her to dive into the exploration of the combination of new media and images. At present, Ishtar is a freelance graphic designer and also a visual artist, swinging between 3-D objects and 2-D images with various medias that include ready-made items, resin, pottery, moving images, a home printer, collages, and an iPhone 6X that has been dropped for many times.

Not very active on LinkedIn. Find me at ⟣⟣⟣⟣
▱ IG---https://www.instagram.com/ishtarhsu/
▱ Website---https://ishtarhsu.com/

profile_positions.location: 尼德蘭 南荷蘭省 斯奇丹
profile_positions.description:
My main series of works are “StiLLLife” for video & installation, “Weather Report” for painting and “Boy, Boy, Fruit” for sculpture. They are exhibited in various places from time to time. 

⟥ Remarkable service: custom eye and partial body painting ⟢ https://www.instagram.com/stories/highlights/17857015844241423/
⟥ Keen to cooperate with other creators from different backgrounds.
⟥ Self-publication—StiLLLife: Collection 00? ⟢ https://ishtarhsu.com/Collection-00
⟥ The collections are mainly collected privately. 
⟥ Collection 007 is added to the collection of Neiwei Art Center, Kaohsiung.
⟥ The collection has been published since 2019.
profile_positions.title: Visual Artist

profile_positions.location: 尼德蘭 南荷蘭省 斯奇丹
profile_positions.description:
Since 2018, I have worked as a freelance graphic designer with clients from different backgrounds to provide diversified and flexible visual design services.

░ Provide the marketing collaterals design (e.g., banners, brochures and flyers)
░ Provide the exhibition visuals and collateral design.
░ Provide the service of book layout and cover design. 
░ Provide the service of illustration.
░ Advise on identity, branding and promotional guidelines
░ Provide the service of packaging design
░ Assume the printing process supervision and discussion
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer

profile_positions.description:
Sen Yu Library is a conceptual/non-physical bookstore occupying different spaces as its nomadic bases. The bookstore provides free borrowing services for owner-selected books, CDs and DVDs. It has actively introduced the concept of a human library and has invited many artists to explore the possibilities of books with a focus on reading.

▒ Assume the CIS and Key-visual design.
▒ Provide the marketing collaterals design (e.g., banners, brochures and flyers)
▒ Assist with the establishment of a concept elaboration by graphic scope.
▒ Provide advice on the business, exhibitions and promotion strategy
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer

profile_positions.description:
Isha Jewelry offers high-quality 925 silver accessories. The customers create their name accessories and beaded accessories freely on the website. We worked closely with a factory in Yilan(Taiwan) and Guangzhou(China). I had several chances to cooperate with many people who devote themselves to their professional fields.

⧆ Participate in the silver accessories engraving and production process with a graphic perspective. Assist with the system establishment from production, packing and shipping process.
⧆ Attend to the trend of the accessories for each season.
⧆ Implement the website interface design
⧆ Assume the icon design
⧆ Assume the photography supervision and retouching of accessories
⧆ Assume the discussion with UI and UX designers. Assist with the element design.
⧆ Assume project process management and implementation.
⧆ Assume the discussion with the photographer and photographic elements management.
⧆ Assume the CIS revision and re-establishment
⧆ Assume the packaging and shipping process advice
⧆ Assume the Key-visual design for each season
⧆ Assume the retouching of products' photo
profile_positions.title: Senior Graphic Designer

profile_positions.description:
I had positioned as a storyteller within this job. The experience of learning how to elaborate the story through design was essential to me. It has an amazing impact on the future. "anBranding co." provide a wide range of design services, from exhibition design, space design, branding, and collateral material design to event planning. I mainly responded to the company's branch brand. I participated in product development, event planning and the implementation of brand strategies. At the same time, I also assisted with the design projects for our clients.

⎔ Intensify the sensibility of everyday life and translate the observations with a design perspective
⎔ Elaborate on the approach through design and event planning: Ideas are intertwined with life
⎔ Response to copywriting and social media management
⎔ Response to visual design projects and the production of related promotional materials
⎔ Response to event planning and implementation
⎔ Response to product and packaging design prototyping
⎔ Response to supervision and discussion during the production process
⎔ Assist in the execution of design projects and proposals
⎔ Response to connecting with various alternative spaces for consignment and promotion.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer
